item.title: BadBox malware botnet infects 192,000 Android devices despite disruption
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: The BadBox Android malware botnet has grown to over 192,000 infected devices worldwide despite a recent sinkhole operation that attempted to disrupt the operation in Germany. [...]

item.title: Microsoft 365 users hit by random product deactivation errors
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: ​Microsoft is investigating a known issue randomly triggering "Product Deactivated" errors for customers using Microsoft 365 Office apps. [...]

item.title: Android malware found on Amazon Appstore disguised as health app
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: A malicious Android spyware application named 'BMI CalculationVsn' was discovered on the Amazon Appstore, masquerading as a simple health tool but stealing data from infected devices in the background. [...]

item.title: Juniper warns of Mirai botnet targeting Session Smart routers
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Juniper Networks has warned customers of Mirai malware attacks targeting and infecting Session Smart routers using default credentials. [...]

item.title: Windows 11 24H2 upgrades blocked on some PCs due to audio issues
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft has added another Windows 11 24H2 upgrade block for systems with Dirac audio improvement software due to compatibility issues breaking sound output. [...]

item.title: Fortinet warns of FortiWLM bug giving hackers admin privileges
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Fortinet has disclosed a critical vulnerability in Fortinet Wireless Manager (FortiWLM) that allows remote attackers to take over devices by executing unauthorized code or commands through specially crafted web requests. [...]

item.title: Microsoft says Auto HDR causes game freezes on Windows 11 24H2
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft is now blocking Windows 11 24H2 upgrades on systems with Auto HDR enabled due to a compatibility issue that causes game freezes. [...]

item.title: BeyondTrust says hackers breached Remote Support SaaS instances
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Privileged access management company BeyondTrust suffered a cyberattack in early December after threat actors breached some of its Remote Support SaaS instances. [...]

item.title: Ongoing phishing attack abuses Google Calendar to bypass spam filters
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: An ongoing phishing scam is abusing Google Calendar invites and Google Drawings pages to steal credentials while bypassing spam filters. [...]

item.title: Raccoon Stealer malware operator gets 5 years in prison after guilty plea
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: ​​Ukrainian national Mark Sokolovsky was sentenced today to five years in prison for his involvement in the Raccoon Stealer malware cybercrime operation. [...]

item.title: Russian hackers use RDP proxies to steal data in MiTM attacks
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: The Russian hacking group tracked as APT29 (aka "Midnight Blizzard") is using a network of 193 remote desktop protocol proxy servers to perform man-in-the-middle (MiTM) attacks to steal data and credentials and to install malicious payloads. [...]

item.title: US considers banning TP-Link routers over cybersecurity risks
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: The U.S. government is considering banning TP-Link routers starting next year if ongoing investigations find that their use in cyberattacks poses a national security risk. [...]
